statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ -5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 3 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ 1 \\ 9 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.
